Description.Text:
Property Location
Les Jardins du Marais is in the heart of Paris, walking distance from Bataclan and Picasso Museum. This 4-star residence is close to Notre Dame Cathedral and Louvre Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 265 air-conditioned rooms featuring microwaves and minibars. Satellite programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a 24-hour health club and a fitness center. This residence also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the residence's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and limo/town car service. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the residence's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Les Jardins du Marais is in the heart of Paris, walking distance from Bataclan and Picasso Museum. This 4-star residence is close to Notre Dame Cathedral and Louvre Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Bataclan - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Picasso Museum - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Place des Vosges - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Carnavalet Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Victor Hugo's House - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Place de la Republique - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

Place de la Bastille - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Opera Bastille - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Arts et Metiers Museum - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Pont Marie - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Hotel de Ville - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Museum Georges Pompidou - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Bazar de l'Hotel de Ville - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Stravinsky Fountain - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 14.3 km / 8.9 mi
Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle) - 21.8 km / 13.5 mi

The preferred airport for Les Jardins du Marais is Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Les Jardins du Marais are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 14.2 km / 8.8 mi
Paris (CDG-Charles de Gaulle) - 20.4 km / 12.7 mi

The preferred airport for Les Jardins du Marais is Paris (CDG-Charles de Gaulle).
